description: This file contains CSS rules for managing themes and styling of the App component in a React application. It defines CSS variables for light and dark themes, and styles for various elements, including headers, links, and buttons.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with styles for alignment and colors based on the defined theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application with a background color and flexible layout.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo section of the application with a defined height and a spinning animation.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Custom link style with color transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling themes with styles for hover and active states.
